cast: Cast : Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler
movie_description: Summary : Over the course of several years, two convicts form a friendship, seeking consolation and, eventually, redemption through basic compassion.

cast: Cast : Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Diane Keaton
movie_description: Summary : Don Vito Corleone, head of a mafia family, decides to hand over his empire to his youngest son Michael. However, his decision unintentionally puts the lives of his loved ones in grave danger.

cast: Cast : Kemal Sunal, Münir Özkul, Halit Akçatepe, Tarik Akan
movie_description: Summary : Lazy, uneducated students share a very close bond. They live together in the dormitory, where they plan their latest pranks. When a new headmaster arrives, the students naturally try to overthrow him. A comic war of nitwits follows.

cast: Cast : Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine
movie_description: Summary : When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

cast: Cast : Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley, Caroline Goodall
movie_description: Summary : In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

movie_name: Title : The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
cast: Cast : Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom
movie_description: Summary : Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

cast: Cast : Henry Fonda, Lee J. Cobb, Martin Balsam, John Fiedler
movie_description: Summary : The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

cast: Cast : Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton
movie_description: Summary : The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

cast: Cast : John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson, Bruce Willis
movie_description: Summary : The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

cast: Cast : Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Meat Loaf, Zach Grenier
movie_description: Summary : An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

movie_name: Title : The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
cast: Cast : Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom, Sean Bean
movie_description: Summary : A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

cast: Cast : Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise, Sally Field
movie_description: Summary : The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

movie_name: Title : The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
cast: Cast : Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen, Orlando Bloom
movie_description: Summary : While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

cast: Cast : Suriya, Lijo Mol Jose, Manikandan K., Rajisha Vijayan
movie_description: Summary : When a tribal man is arrested for a case of alleged theft, his wife turns to a human-rights lawyer to help bring justice.

cast: Cast : Rakshit Shetty, Charlie, Sangeetha Sringeri, Raj B. Shetty
movie_description: Summary : Dharma is stuck in a rut with his negative and lonely lifestyle and spends each day in the comfort of his loneliness. A pup named Charlie enters his life and gives him a new perspective towards it.

cast: Cast : Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain, Mackenzie Foy
movie_description: Summary : When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

cast: Cast : Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta, Joe Pesci, Lorraine Bracco
movie_description: Summary : The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

movie_name: Title : One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
cast: Cast : Jack Nicholson, Louise Fletcher, Michael Berryman, Peter Brocco
movie_description: Summary : In the Fall of 1963, a Korean War veteran and criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rallies up the scared patients against the tyrannical nurse.

cast: Cast : Suriya, Paresh Rawal, Aparna Balamurali, Urvashi
movie_description: Summary : Nedumaaran Rajangam "Maara" sets out to make the common man fly and in the process takes on the world's most capital intensive industry and several enemies who stand in his way.

cast: Cast : Madhavan, Simran, Rajit Kapoor, Ravi Raghavendra
movie_description: Summary : Based on the life of Indian Space Research Organization scientist Nambi Narayanan, who was framed for being a spy and arrested in 1994. Though free, he continues to fight for justice against the officials who falsely implicated him.

movie_name: Title : The Silence of the Lambs
cast: Cast : Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Scott Glenn, Ted Levine
movie_description: Summary : A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

cast: Cast : Morgan Freeman, Brad Pitt, Kevin Spacey, Andrew Kevin Walker
movie_description: Summary : Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

cast: Cast : Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse, Bonnie Hunt
movie_description: Summary : A tale set on death row in a Southern jail, where gentle giant John possesses the mysterious power to heal people's ailments. When the lead guard, Paul, recognizes John's gift, he tries to help stave off the condemned man's execution.

cast: Cast : Tom Hanks, Matt Damon, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns
movie_description: Summary : Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

cast: Cast : Alexandre Rodrigues, Leandro Firmino, Matheus Nachtergaele, Phellipe Haagensen
movie_description: Summary : In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

cast: Cast : Roberto Benigni, Nicoletta Braschi, Giorgio Cantarini, Giustino Durano
movie_description: Summary : When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

cast: Cast : James Stewart, Donna Reed, Lionel Barrymore, Thomas Mitchell
movie_description: Summary : An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

cast: Cast : Toshirô Mifune, Takashi Shimura, Keiko Tsushima, Yukiko Shimazaki
movie_description: Summary : Farmers from a village exploited by bandits hire a veteran samurai for protection, who gathers six other samurai to join him.

cast: Cast : Tatsuya Nakadai, Akira Ishihama, Shima Iwashita, Tetsurô Tanba
movie_description: Summary : When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

cast: Cast : Mithun Chakraborty, Anupam Kher, Darshan Kumaar, Pallavi Joshi
movie_description: Summary : A heart-wrenching tale that captures the pain, suffering, and struggle of the Kashmiri Pandit community in 1990 and leads Krishna, a young college student, to set out on a quest to uncover the truth.

cast: Cast : Dulquer Salmaan, Mrunal Thakur, Rashmika Mandanna, Sumanth
movie_description: Summary : An orphan soldier, Lieutenant Ram's life changes, after he gets a letter from a girl named Sita. He meets her and love blossoms between them. When he comes back to his camp in Kashmir,After he gets caught in jail, he sends a letter to Sita which won't reach her.

cast: Cast : Cillian Murphy, Emily Blunt, Matt Damon, Robert Downey Jr.
movie_description: Summary : The story of American scientist, J. Robert Oppenheimer, and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

cast: Cast : Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen, Oliver Reed
movie_description: Summary : A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

cast: Cast : Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson, Mark Wahlberg
movie_description: Summary : An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

cast: Cast : Song Kang-ho, Lee Sun-kyun, Cho Yeo-jeong, Choi Woo-sik
movie_description: Summary : Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

cast: Cast : Christian Bale, Hugh Jackman, Scarlett Johansson, Michael Caine
movie_description: Summary : After a tragic accident, two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

cast: Cast : Miles Teller, J.K. Simmons, Melissa Benoist, Paul Reiser
movie_description: Summary : A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

cast: Cast : Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio, Kerry Washington
movie_description: Summary : With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

cast: Cast : Jean Reno, Gary Oldman, Natalie Portman, Danny Aiello
movie_description: Summary : 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

cast: Cast : Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones, Whoopi Goldberg
movie_description: Summary : Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

cast: Cast : Kevin Spacey, Gabriel Byrne, Chazz Palminteri, Stephen Baldwin
movie_description: Summary : The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.

cast: Cast : François Cluzet, Omar Sy, Anne Le Ny, Audrey Fleurot
movie_description: Summary : After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

cast: Cast : Edward Norton, Edward Furlong, Beverly D'Angelo, Jennifer Lien
movie_description: Summary : Living a life marked by violence, neo-Nazi Derek finally goes to prison after killing two black youths. Upon his release, Derek vows to change; he hopes to prevent his brother, Danny, who idolizes Derek, from following in his footsteps.

cast: Cast : Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann, Frank Finlay, Emilia Fox
movie_description: Summary : A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

cast: Cast : Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid, Claude Rains
movie_description: Summary : A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

cast: Cast : Tsutomu Tatsumi, Ayano Shiraishi, Akemi Yamaguchi, Yoshiko Shinohara
movie_description: Summary : A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

cast: Cast : Philippe Noiret, Enzo Cannavale, Antonella Attili, Isa Danieli
movie_description: Summary : A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

cast: Cast : Charles Chaplin, Paulette Goddard, Henry Bergman, Tiny Sandford
movie_description: Summary : The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

cast: Cast : Charles Chaplin, Virginia Cherrill, Florence Lee, Harry Myers
movie_description: Summary : With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

cast: Cast : Vijay Sethupathi, Adithya Bhaskar, Trisha Krishnan, Gouri Kishan
movie_description: Summary : Two high school sweethearts meet at a reunion after 22 years and reminisce about their past.
